com.centurylink.mdw.util

Class JsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.util.JsonUtil

  • public class JsonUtil
extends Object
    Helper methods and access to JSON configuration values. Takes into account PaaS vs File-based configurations.
